alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 13 at 11:09AM AKST until November 13 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Until to 9 PM AKST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another round of snow is expected tonight that will bring additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
